item.title: Forget the hype — real AI agents solve bounded problems, not open-world fantasies
item.description: Event-driven multi-agent systems are a practical architecture for working with imperfect tools in a structured way.

item.title: Sakana AI’s TreeQuest: Deploy multi-model teams that outperform individual LLMs by 30%
item.description: Sakana AI's new inference-time scaling technique uses Monte-Carlo Tree Search to orchestrate multiple LLMs to collaborate on complex tasks.

item.title: Dust hits $6M ARR helping enterprises build AI agents that actually do stuff instead of just talking
item.description: Dust AI startup hits $6M revenue building enterprise agents that automate workflows and take real actions across business systems using Anthropic's Cl...

item.title: HOLY SMOKES! A new, 200% faster DeepSeek R1-0528 variant appears from German lab TNG Technology Consulting GmbH
item.description: This gain is made possible by TNG’s Assembly-of-Experts (AoE) method — a technique for building LLMs by selectively merging the weight tensors

item.title: Confidence in agentic AI: Why eval infrastructure must come first
item.description: At VentureBeat’s Transform 2025, tech leaders gathered to talk about how they're transforming their business with agents.
